Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2009 09:54AM sinigang43 wrote: The surgeon does not read the sample.  The pathologist does.  The surgeon can try to be positive and tell you it's probably b9, but you need to wait for the final result which takes weeks for surgery biopsy, and takes days for needle biopsy.  Good luck.  I'm waiting for my results too.
Posts.Title: Excisional Biopsy ? cemjo3 sinigang43
